website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for anyone with serious peanut allergies. With only one ingredient, Zinke Orchards is about as natural as it gets.
pros: The butter is made in a peanut-free environment, so there is no  cross contamination
Natural oil separation is minimal, and easy to mix
Flavor is simple and delicious with an appealing creamy texture
Available in a convenient 3-pack at a reasonable price
cons: Skin is not removed from the almonds, so you may find small black pieces of skin throughout the butter

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! This product is not quality.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to write negative reviews, but if I could give this less than a star I would. I'm very confused by all the positive comments. Despite the date showing it was good it seemed old. Completely separated with portions of it so hard at the bottom that I scraped it with a knife to remove. In order to make it edible I had to put it in my blender and mix in coconut oil. I ordered three and I can't wait to be done to get something different.
customer_reviews.author: Life is Breezy

customer_reviews.title: best almond butter available anywhere
customer_reviews.text: We've tried other almond butters but Zinke is the best. Most of them contain palm oil and some even sugar. Zinke's is just roasted almonds. The flavor is fantastic. It is hard for me to stir. I bought a 3 pack so I open all 3 jars at once, put them in my mixer and within a couple of minutes, it's perfect. Then I put 1 in the frig and 2 in the freezer for later. I don't think it spreads as easy as peanut butter but it is thicker since it doesn't have added ingredients. I usually just eat spoonfuls out of the jar so spreadability isn't a problem for me. For a great snack or sandwich, but this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: OLD AWFUL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The jars I received are VERY OLD! I literally spent 45 minutes trying to stir one jar of this product, and ended up putting it in a bowl to try and combine it! Didn't work, there are still large, hard chunks that refuse to be incorporated. Given the cost of this product, I expect to receive a quality item!! I understand having to stir the oil that separates, but this is just plain old and unusable! DISGUSTED AND WILL NEVER PURCHASE AGAIN!!! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: BMcCabe

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVED!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for years. This crunchy almond butter used to come VERY separated with large areas of dried out, hard product in the bottom. It would need copious and lengthy stirring. The product did always taste fine. But, recently, as of April 2020, all three containers came needing only modest stirring. MUCH fresher with zero dried out areas on the bottom. I think this just might be the best value in Almond Butter now. I add a minuscule amount of Hain Sea Salt with iodine, which is also available here on Amazon. Thank you, Amazon! Thank you, Zinke Orchards! Placing another order now.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I’m an almond and almond butter aficionado. Eat this butter everyday. Other almond butter products taste stale in comparison, and many seem adulterated with extra, perhaps-not-almond, oil. Zinke Orchards Almond Butter tastes like one would expect. It also has the consistency one would expect of a 100% almond product — very thick. Almonds are very dense. With grinding them down, one would expect the result to be very thick. Most jars of Zinke almond butter need to be stirred up when opened, but that is a small price to pay for a fresh, nutritious, and tasty product. Thanks Zinke and Amazon for making this product available.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Stale and hard as a brick
customer_reviews.text: This was my 16th, and probably last, purchase of Zinke almond butter three pack. The only way I could mix the last few shipments was to remove the entire content from the jar and work it with a pestle. The oil was on top and the solid part on the bottom was hard as a rock. When delivered it was very close to its "use-by date" and appeared to have been sitting on a shelf for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Over 65 in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Not usable
customer_reviews.text: The butter was so separated so that the oil could not be mixed into the rock solid, dried nuts part. The expiration date for all three was only 5 months away. I saw another one star review saying they put it in a blender with coconut oil to make it spreadable. I am going to cut away the dry, discolored part and maybe warm it before adding olive oil. Or throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but a bit runny
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is very nice, the sodium is very low and there's no added sugar, so I certainly recommend this almond butter. I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 because: - there's a little too much oil; the butter is runnier than I like. - the serving size for nutrients is in oz & gm instead of tbsp, so it's challenging to compare to other nut butters, and the print on that part of the label is microscopic. - I had to take a chance and buy three jars instead of being able to buy a single jar. - There's no lot number or expiration date on the label or jar that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: lefty3

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Oil, Too Little Taste
customer_reviews.text: The hassle of getting the cement-like portion mixed in with the oil, in order to have a nice textured butter, is not worth the taste or resulting consistency. The taste is just ok (I've tried So many crunchy almond butters and Jif was the only one that was excellent in taste and crunchiness...no longer made) and the crunchiness is like very tiny pebbles. I'll do what I've done with other brands and mix with Barney's crunchy in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Linnie

customer_reviews.title: Best Almond Butter I Have Tasted!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best almond butter that I have found. There's no sugar or palm oil added, unlike with a lot of other brands. It tastes great. I've had other almond butters that tasted like the almonds were under roasted, but the almonds used for this taste perfectly roasted. I buy a 3-pack about every other month because my husband and I love to use it on toast, apples, corn muffins, crackers, in smoothies, etc... It's good, it's healthy, and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Miyuki

customer_reviews.title: Like fresh ground
customer_reviews.text: Back in the olden times (pre-Covid), I did fresh-ground at Whole Foods. This is a fully equal alternative. Enough oil to make it spreadable. Not so much that have I pour off a bunch, as with most pre-packaged brands (including Kirkland). It may be plant oil, but it's still oil. Taste is fully almondy, no sugar, just the right amount of salt. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. O.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste after stirring
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this brand in the smooth but it wasn’t available, I took a chance on crunchy. Yes you have to stir this product and yes the almond skins collect on the sides of the jar . I look at it this way it’s exercise. I use a butter knife and elbow grease and it does the trick. I truly like the natural taste of this almond butter no salt or sugar. I will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Going with a different brand next time
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this before and don't remember having such a difficult time mixing the contents. It's like a brick saturated with clear oil.. After I cut it up and mixed it tasted good. The jars are plastic and that doesn't help any.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good butter, worsening price
customer_reviews.text: I was getting almond butter for about $6/pint in the store (lidl). Nothing exceptional but the price was right. Finally decided to try zinke and it was way better. I liked it so much, I started telling people about it. I’ve been buying it for keto for about 5 months. Then the price went up from $10/jar to $12/jar in July 2020. I was about to purchase a dozen jars. Sorry Zinke, I’m out at that price. You lost me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hellams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, delicious and healthful.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are snowbirds (CT/FL) and we very much enjoy high-quality almond butter. When in CT we purchase this product from Trader Joe's, and we also bring down a few jars with us because we don't have a T.J. anywhere near our house in Sebastian FL. We recently ran out of our almond butter supply and couldn't find what we wanted in Publix or Walmart, so I ordered this from amazon.com. We are VERY HAPPY with the taste and texture of Zinke Orchards Crunchy Almond Butter, and buying it in the 3-pack option made it very economical for us.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie brooklyn girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this Almond Butter
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to not like about this Almond butter. Picky or lazy people may not like having to stir but the oil/butter separation says REAL STUFF to me. Not some crappy artificial chemical concoction. Just flip the container over every time you use it and it will practically mix itself unless you only use it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bish

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to mix
customer_reviews.text: There was a rather large accumulation of oil on the top of all three jars. The almond butter on the bottom was very hard. As a result it was extremely difficult to mix the oil and the hard butter on the bottom together to make a smooth almond butter. After a lot of effort it is still somewhat lumpy. I suspect that the product was made long ago and that's why this condition existed. There was no date on the jar at least not one that I could find. There should be a "use by date".
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rassner

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return this product because the jars weren't full. When I discovered that I couldn't return it, I tried it. I think it's the worse almond butter I have ever eaten. It's runny and doesn't have any flavor, not even an almond flavor. I have been on a Paleo diet for seven months so I have tried many brands. I'm very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Butter!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this brand. Our 9 year old has an anaphylactic allergy to Cashews. This company farms and processes the Almonds and only their almonds. We have been buying this for about 4-5 years. Found them long before they were on Amazon and ordered directly from them. Quality is very high. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoJS

customer_reviews.title: BEST I've tasted, beats Maranatha by a HUGE margin!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST almond butter I've tasted, even tastes like the pure almond butter I sometimes make in my Vitamix! But watch the expiration date...i received two that had already expired & were hard as s rock!! I used to buy the Maranatha type that you had to stir up then keep in the fridge -- I loved it!! But Maranatha has CHANGED their formulations, & I do not like the taste or consistency now. so again, I'm VERY happy to find this brand!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Separated
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite crunchy almond butter, but...! Occasionally it is comes pretty well mixed...most times the oil is separated and is difficult and takes forever to mix in, which is very annoying to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Sue

customer_reviews.title: Pure almond butter
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular purchaser of this delicious almond butter. It's difficult to find pure almond butter without a bunch of additives like palm oil or cane sugar. This almond butter is simple and pure. I also love that it comes in smooth or crunchy. I prefer crunchy but to each his/her own. I only wish it was available in organic and subscribe and save so that I could purchase regularly each month for a discount.
customer_reviews.author: Canesumfan0

customer_reviews.title: Ecactly What I Was Seeking
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted almond butter but also wanted it to be crunchy. This product has it all so long as I remember to leave it standing upside down to keep the oil from separating and standing on the top. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Soothsayer

customer_reviews.title: Half Full, or Half Empty? (Check your jars!)
customer_reviews.text: This almond butter is great! Because there were three jars, I grabbed the first one out of the box and stored the other two away without much thought. But when I ate through them and got to the last jar, I realized that the jar was only half-full. The other two were totally full. Make sure you check your jars before opening any of them!
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it with the price increase
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond butter. It's the best I've had, and it was a great value. Recently the price was raised significantly, about 30% in one shot. It was quite a shock when I went to reorder it. It's still a great item, but for me, it's not worth the higher price, especially when it's such a significant jump.
customer_reviews.author: Dyer

customer_reviews.title: It is usually very good. This time the jars contained a large clump ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item several times. It is usually very good. This time the jars contained a large clump of dried almonds surrounded by a lot of oil. I had to empty the contents into a bowl and use a heavy duty spoon for mixing. The final product is fine. The freshness date on the jar is 12/18 and I wouldn’t expect this much separation when the date is 7 months out.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Tasty almond butter without additives
customer_reviews.text: It’s a flavorful almond butter and it spreads with very little stirring. The almond butter I usually buy at my local grocery store isn’t available. I tried this almond butter and I like it better. You have a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: HLC78

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third jar, and I'm addicted. I got my friends hooked on this. It has that wonderful nutty flavor that almond butter is supposed to have. It has no sugar or hydrogenated oils added. Yeah, sometimes it can be hard to stir, and other times it's fine. That's what unadulterated nut butters are supposed to be. It could be a tad bit crunchier, but it's still my favorite almond butter
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint

customer_reviews.title: Great value - great taste - no added sugar
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this brand and this product. Bought both crunchy and smooth, but can't decide which I like better. Price compares very favorably to other suppliers. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob F

customer_reviews.title: Almond Brick not butter
customer_reviews.text: You will need a blender to mix this almond butter. I'm well aware that the almonds and oils separate when they sit but in this product the almonds turn into a brick. If you have any intention of using this in a sandwich... FORGET IT. The package came with three jars and each one was just as bad as the next. I gave it one star because I HAD to. A word to the wise.
customer_reviews.author: up

customer_reviews.title: Almond Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: I freely admit to being an almond butter snob. If a company adds sweeteners or oils in their nut butter, it just means they're trying to make up for bad nuts. A good almond butter should be 100% almonds, and preferably for those of us with allergies, processed in an almond-only plant. I pretty much eat my Zinke's Almond Butter right out of the jar. Sometimes it makes it on my rice crackers or carrots, but usually it's me, a spoon and a jar of Zinke Orchards Crunchy Almond Butter. Almond heaven!
customer_reviews.author: BleusChat

customer_reviews.title: Opinion revised - a great product
customer_reviews.text: 5/8/14 I gave this product three stars in my initial review because the first jar I opened was not crunchy enough. It turned out that this was probably just a quality control glitch, because the other jars were all fine. I'm now in the 'love it' camp. A tiny bit of salt brings out the flavor, but I say that realizing that a lot of people don't like to add salt to their food and you might like it fine without. I'm eating about a jar a week because this is now my favorite snack food - what more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: CyberCrone

customer_reviews.title: It’s good. It arrives on time.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this almond butter in her protein shake every morning. She’s been using it for a few years now. I order them for her when she’s on the last jar. I eat it sometimes myself. It’s good. It arrives on time. We are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: G. Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Crunch?
customer_reviews.text: Crunchy? I've had both the crunchy and smooth version of this brand and can't tell the difference between the two. The quality and taste are great, just not sure why bother putting the word "crunchy" on the label, when there's nothing crunchy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Want happened to this product!! I've purchased it a few times in the past and it was great...But my most recent orders have been terrible. All 3 jars were filled with chunks of very dry almond clusters just sitting in almond oil. And you can even stir or beat the dry chucks apart...What happened??? I'm so disappointed because this is not a cheap product and NOT what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Almond butters and this one is the cream of the crop. It is fresh and there are no extra ingredients! The oil separates some from the butter but it is very easy to mix.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and consistency
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a quality Almond Butter made with just almonds. Thought I would try Zinke based on the Amazon reviews and I am not disappointed! Wish they would put this product on Subscribe and Save! This butter has a little bit of oil at the top (as they all do) but unlike others, it blends in real well when I stir it and stays that way. I keep in the refrigerator and it is soft and creamy. Easy to get out and spread! I love Trader Joe's AB with Sea Salt but it is often not available. So I just get the plain and add my own Sea salt. Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Skeans

customer_reviews.title: Ingredient....singular
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I don’t know why, since it’s just plain, but it’s pure, unaltered almond goodness. The ingredients make me happy too. It says “☝🏼Ingredient: dry-roasted almonds” .... not many foods have the ingredient singular.
customer_reviews.author: T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite pleased with this almond butter. It blended very well when stirred for a minute. Nice consistency. Not as crunchy as some but just fine.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tarlow

customer_reviews.title: Great Almond Butter at a Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent almond butter with one single ingredient, dry roasted almonds. Period, that's it. No hydrogenated this, or sugar that. Simple, very nutty slightly sweet taste. Keeps well and is priced competitively hare on Amazon. Occasionally they feature a carton of 12 directly from the grower that is even more economical than this price for 3 jars, though this prices isn't bad. One of the better nuts to eat from a nutritional standpoint, this almond butter is very much recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best almond butter, I love the crunchy, I eat it right out of the jar or on celery. I love it that it has no sugar, it tasts great
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I ordered this product. The flavor and consistency are exceptional. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Block

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a good almond butter without palm oil!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked for a long time to find a replacement for Kettle brand chunky almond butter after they discontinued it. It's almost impossible to find a good almond butter that isn't full of palm oil. What's the matter people, can't handle stirring your food from time to time? Then I found Zinke, and I'm a happy person. This stuff has some chunk, a good flavor, and the only ingredient on the label is almonds. Thank you Zinke! You have a new fan and the beginning of a long term customer.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Stored by Amazon too long
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this for years and it now seems like it’s stored a long time. Broke a hand blender mixing it by hand
customer_reviews.author: Footloose

customer_reviews.title: Great fresh flavor
customer_reviews.text: This almond butter is so delicious...we use it on everything from apples to muffins. I like the crunchy as well as the smooth...but I am always partial to a nice crunchy nut butter. The crunchy style is not like crunchy peanut butter...much smaller bits, but it is good and creamy as well. Other almond butters I have tried have been drier and have added sugar and salt. This is just almonds and you can really taste the difference in the fresh flavor!
customer_reviews.author: NMcollielover

customer_reviews.title: No flavor
customer_reviews.text: this does not taste like the almond butter I purchased from store. It is very bland and has no flavor. It is a shame that this cannot be returned. I will feed it to my dogs instead of peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: Botkin

customer_reviews.title: Nothing added! Just delicious almonds!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the plain, simple flavor of this almond butter - with no sugar, salt, palm oil, or anything else added. Just the wonderful taste of roasted almonds.
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, pure almond butter
customer_reviews.text: This almond butter is the best! Great flavor and consistency - I really didn't even have to stir it. And best of all there is only one ingredient: almonds. No oil, sugar, salt, etc. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like crunchy nut butter and this fills the bill. It is softer than most peanut butter but not runny.
customer_reviews.author: R. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Very good almond butter
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this several times and it's always good. I store the jars upside down, so easier to stir the oil in when a new jar is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the Zinke Orchards Almond Butter for a couple of years now, and find it to be a consistently excellent product. There is some oil separation, but a little stirring mixes it back into the almond paste. Taste is consistently good. Another nice feature for online purchasers is that it comes in plastic jars, rather than glass, so no broken glass jars on arrival. The three-pack ships in a custom sized box, which thoroughly protects the jars for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Almond Butter for Paleo Diet
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I started the Paleo diet. Almond butter is an ingredient in several recipes. This is our favorite brand of almond butter. We have tried the almond butter from Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, etc. This brand is our favorite. The crunchiness is just right. It is creamy. Flavor is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: riasupermomma

customer_reviews.title: Nice and peanut free
customer_reviews.text: Just good almond butter! I really appreciate the free s/h. I've bought through the company's website, and shipping for almond butter is expensive! This made it more affordable and it's great for my daughter with her peanut allergy. This isn't even made in the same facility as something else with peanuts so that I can know it is safe for my daughter to eat!
customer_reviews.author: happy to contribute

customer_reviews.title: Zinke orchard almond butter
customer_reviews.text: Being allergic to peanuts, I only order this almond butter. It is pure and does not go through the peanut machines. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered was past its best if used by date
customer_reviews.text: The almond butter was delivered to me on August 14, 2020. On the lower side of the jars in raised letters is "BEST IF USED BY 04/29/2020. The oil has completely separated from the ground almonds. I haven't been able to fully remix the oil and ground almonds. It is difficult to spread.
customer_reviews.author: A Lake Rat

customer_reviews.title: You need to be able to blend the oil with the butter.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the crunchy style almond butter for several years and always been able to mix the oil into the butter easily. With the last three jars I purchased, the butter was so dry and hard, it made blending the oil into it almost impossible. It still tastes great, but it just won't mix Don't know if I got a bad batch or jars that were older.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor, texture -- so/so
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor. No added sugars. Texture is too finely ground to be considered chunky. Gritty is a better description. As before, has an excellent taste but leaves mouth feeling "tacky or pasty" while eating . Still very good and 100% natural. Oil was separated but easily stirred back in.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Smith

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Your Taste Buds Will Be Spoiled Forever
customer_reviews.text: The BEST Almond Butter. It spoils you for any other.
customer_reviews.author: Sonq'o

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy Good
customer_reviews.text: This brand along with Maise Janes are my favorites. Since we blast through the bottles I bought the 12 pack which works out to the cheapest price. The jars are plastic and well sealed compared to the ever dangerous Amazon shipping of the glass loose lidded Maise Janes. It's addicting I tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Victor E

customer_reviews.title: Almond Butter
customer_reviews.text: The product was runnier than I thought it would be. Taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Susie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pure Almond Butter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond butter in both the crunchy and smooth. I have ordered it a number of times and will continue to do so...as well as sending is as a gift to friends. The price is reasonable and importantly it is only almonds with no additives or preservatives! Not easy to find...read your labels!
customer_reviews.author: plum2torte

customer_reviews.title: Not crunchy.
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not crunchy at all. There were a few larger pieces, but overall I would call the texture creamy. The almond butter was just okay. I like that they don't add any extra unneeded ingredients. I probably won't be buying again though just because I like my nut butters crunchier.
customer_reviews.author: Katagin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. So thick I can’t spread it on my bread
customer_reviews.author: H. L. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: One of the better almond butters I’ve tried when I get a good batch.
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are no extra ingredients in the almond butter and the flavor is good. Recently the quality has been inconsistent and it can be very difficult to stir n the oil.
customer_reviews.author: A.B. Cee

customer_reviews.title: Oh, Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Received my 3 pack tonight and have already delved into it. This is just as good as the natural almond butter (no sugar, no salt) I was purchasing at the health store for $10.79 a jar. I find it to be super chunky which adds to that roasted almond taste. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenapearl

customer_reviews.title: I've been buying this almond butter for over 6 months now and can honestly say it tastes great and is super affordable
customer_reviews.text: I live in New York City and almond butter costs an arm and a leg (upwards or $25/jar). I've been buying this almond butter for over 6 months now and can honestly say it tastes great and is super affordable!
customer_reviews.author: maxemoose

customer_reviews.title: I love this almond butter
customer_reviews.text: Almond butter is pricey, but this brand is one of the less expensive brands. This almond butter is what it says on the tin - pure almond butter. No added sugar, nothing fancy...just crunchy almond butter. I've used it in smoothies, baked goods, on bread... Very, very tasty stuff. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent. I was using another brand that got too expensive so decided to try this. It blends much easier than the other, no hard lumps at the bottom. I usually just add a little honey to sweeten it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Sams club has a product a bit cheaper but it has salt and wasn't nearly as good as our homemade
customer_reviews.text: We have made our own this winter in Texas but off the grid this summer without our food processor we looked around. Sams club has a product a bit cheaper but it has salt and wasn't nearly as good as our homemade. We ordered this after reading reviews and decided to give it a try. We live the taste and the crunch!! The only issue is being able to stop!! Wonderful product and we just ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: crooner

customer_reviews.title: it's a good deal ($8
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 3 (16 oz jars) pack of Zinke Orchards Crunchy Almond Butter. For $25.00, it's a good deal ($8.33 per jar), especially since the only ingredient is dry roasted almonds. I've opened 1 of my 3 jars so far, and it is both delicious and easy to spread (it didn't come overly separated, so it was easy to stir evenly). Barring a different experience from the other two jars, I'd purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best almond butter!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really an almond butter fan- I prefer peanut butter; however, peanut butter is not on the Paleo diet plan I'm on. But after having bought and tried this almond butter- I won't be going back to peanut butter. Yes...it's that good!!! I will definitely be ordering again- which might be sooner than I planned considering how quickly im going through it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A Lifsey

customer_reviews.title: Delicious nut butter!
customer_reviews.text: We've ordered the creamy (by accident) and crunchy - both delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Bellaluna

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth!!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is okay but when the product came it was separated and it's impossible to stir. There is an oil on top and it seems like no matter how hard I stir it won't mix back together to give me a smoother texture. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C&A Autry

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty. A good deal considering the cost of almond butter in the stores, the kind without sugar anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Like the smaller jars, easy to stir, and taste fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Heaven on a spoon.
customer_reviews.text: The best almond butter I've ever tried-and I've tried several brands over the years. Sticking with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Knox

customer_reviews.title: Good almond butter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the Whole Foods 365 brand of similar product, which they apparently no longer carry and now only have the much more expensive brands, which I refuse to purchase. I am fortunate to have found the Zinke orchards crunchy almond butter which seems to have the same quality and flavor, for just a bit more money.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and no added oils or sugar!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrific! I searched extensively for almond butter that contains just almonds and this is the ONLY brand I found that doesn't add sugar and/or oils. Thought this was a good price and will be purchasing more, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the Natural Product
customer_reviews.text: Put almond butter in our cooked oatmeal,bake chocolate almond butter cookies for granddaughters’ club,make almond butter/jam sandwiches for grandson who is allergic to peanuts,and make my granola recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Lou

customer_reviews.title: You should try this brand!
customer_reviews.text: A friend introduced me to this Almond Butter and I am so glad he did! It's wonderful! When I had finished the jar, I tried to buy almond butter at the grocery store and was so disappointed with the taste. I didn't realize all almond butter wasn't this good. If you've never tried this almond butter, do yourself a favor and order some. It really is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneR

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the smooth I ordered last time and seemed too oily. No oil on top. I use in making my own snack bars with Quinoa, sunflower seeds, coconut, and toasted SesMe Seeds. All seeds an.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Yates

customer_reviews.title: Brands matter
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest, but the best so far. I do not want sugar or other additives. Yes I know I will have to stir it before every use. I have tried other brands on Amazon and this is the best. The cost is high, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elizalde

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this almond butter.
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting almond butter EVER. No additives, just delicious, nutritious almonds! Thank you, Amazon, for making this product available at a reasonable price. Much more expensive in my local organic food cooperative, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: jankran

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed Zinke Orchards Almond Butter for the past 20 years
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed Zinke Orchards Almond Butter for the past 20 years; perhaps longer. This almond butter tastes like fresh roasted almonds. Other brands I have tasted just don't have the fresh and pure roasted almond flavor that Zinke Orchards Almond Butter does. Thank you Zinke Orchards. And thank you for working with Amazon.com. It makes it so much easier to keep this almond butter on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Heather, Harlingen, TX

customer_reviews.title: The only almond butter my 9 year old daughter will eat.
customer_reviews.text: There is something special about this almond butter. My daughter needs high quality foods like this because of a chronic illness. I appreciate that she lathers it on instead of turning up her nose.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerity

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and no added sugar.
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting and no added sugar! I have ordered this many times and recommended to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love almonds, but this taste awful to me. Other may love it.
customer_reviews.author: william wideman

customer_reviews.title: You will like it so much you better order to because you won't eat it all faster than you think
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of different almond butters and this is my favorite it is always fresh delicious and reasonably priced as well
customer_reviews.author: Realfoodonly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTING
customer_reviews.text: This crunchy almond butter was very good. I expected nothing as good as this butter - I have been eating every day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pierotti

customer_reviews.title: It's the best one I've found.
customer_reviews.text: It's back to being my favorite. There was a moment I thought I liked another brand more but I wound up craving this stuff again. I'll never leave you again, my love! It does separate a bit but whatever, I can stir :p
customer_reviews.author: Burt Robbins

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the "crunchy" part
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I purchased. I was disappointed in the "crunchy" part. It was too finely grounded for my liking and very oily.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy 4 Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great almond butter and a great value when bought in the 3 pack. We use it as an ingredient in our "Superfood Bars".
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: but it's very good. I've been snacking on apple slices with almond ...
customer_reviews.text: Yum. could use a bit more crunch, but it's very good. I've been snacking on apple slices with almond butter almost daily since I got it, and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Belle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond butter!! Great taste!! Will continue buying it!!! Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Rojas

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so good it'll make your head explode! I don't know how they do it...I mean, it's just almonds but this stuff is seriously good. I eat it straight out the jar. Amazon delivers this quickly & quite often to my house. Get yourself some...you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: WendyLou

customer_reviews.title: I love crunchy almond meal and this is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love crunchy almond meal and this is the best! I also love that it is packaged in plastic jars for carefree transport when traveling. It does require quite a bit of stirring and refrigeration after being opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but is a great option for those of us who cannot consume peanut ...
customer_reviews.text: Pure and simple almond butter deliciousness. No extra additives, sugar, colors or flavors. If you're looking for sweetened butter, this won't be your thing, but is a great option for those of us who cannot consume peanut butter and want to add something extra to our smoothies or cooking. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: ZimLondie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It tastes so good and it's affordable! I'll purchase more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this almond butter
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond butter. I am a little disappointed that I can't see the pieces of almonds since it says crunchy but the taste is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic taste
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about the reviews saying this almond butter was the best tasting. After all, how much can you do to ground up almonds. I don't know what the Zinke Orchards folks did, but this crunchy almond butter is the best I have ever tasted...and I've tasted a lot of them.
customer_reviews.author: rotpwc

product_meta.title: Zinke Orchards Crunchy Almond Butter (3 Pack) 16oz Jars
product_meta.description: Delicious crunchy almond butter made from only the best California grown almonds. Zinke Orchards grows and process all their own almonds to ensure quality and freshness.
feature_bullets: The only ingredient is dry roasted almonds
